subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares scored 4 minutes 38 seconds into overtime, capping the visiting Islanders’ two-goal comeback in a 4-3 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs.
snippet: John Tavares scored 4 minutes 38 seconds into overtime, capping the visiting Islanders’ two-goal comeback in a 4-3 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs.
